sqlMap.insert: insert into card_data( mem_email ,card_number ,expiry ,birth ,pwd_2digit ,customer_uid ) values( (select mem_id from member where mem_email=#mem_email#), ,#card_number# ,#expiry# ,#birth# ,#pwd_2digit# ,#customer_uid# )
sqlMap.select: select A.card_number ,A.expiry ,A.birth ,A.pwd_2digit ,A.customer_uid from card_data A, member B where B.mem_id = #memid#;
